name: The Bewitched Brew
description:
While visiting your sick grandma you discover a side of her you've never known.

The Bewitched Brew is a retro-style adventure game in which you explore the vast forest and rivers, learn new spells, and collect ingredients to brew a magical tea.

Controls

Movement - WASD / Arrow Keys

Interact - E

Known bugs

- The game is optimized for a 16:9 aspect ratio resolution. When running at a different aspect ratio, the game might look stretched or squashed.

Credits

3D art + coding - Virtual Turtle Games

Music + sound design + 2D art - Peabeaz

Fonts: Alagard & Dogica
